message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic about the time value of money. This is my best offer.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer before the effects of inflation become too significant.
You're running out of time too, Bob. Inflation is hitting you harder!
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.
